abstract:
\begin{abstract}
We demonstrate that an equidistant area spectrum for the link variables
in loop quantum gravity can reproduce both the thermodynamics and 
the quasinormal mode properties of black holes.

\

\begin{abstract}

in loop quantum gravity can reproduce both the thermodynamics and
